parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Tire Failure (BLOW OUT) due to Defective Tire
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Tire failure can lead to loss of vehicle control, accidents, and potential fatalities.
A faulty TPMS can fail to alert the driver of low tire pressure, leading to tire failure, loss of vehicle control, and potential accidents.
symptoms: failure to alert driver of low tire pressure.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Cracks in Rear Walls and Front Finder due to Vibration
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Cracks in the rear walls and front finder can lead to structural integrity issues, potentially causing accidents or injuries due to compromised vehicle stability.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Failure of Grab Handles due to Stress Cracks
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of grab handles can cause falls or injuries, especially for elderly individuals, as they rely on these handles for support while entering or exiting the vehicle.
symptoms: stress marks or cracks visible on the plastic handle
handle comes apart while in use.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Unintended door opening while locked can cause accidents or injuries, as occupants may fall out of the vehicle or be thrown from their seats.
symptoms: no warning or indication before door opens.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The intermittent failure of the rear turn signal can cause confusion to other drivers, leading to potential accidents or near-misses, especially when changing lanes or turning.
symptoms: The rear turn signal light fails to illuminate or flashes intermittently
the turn signal indicator on the dashboard does not function properly
the turn signal switch feels loose or faulty.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The inability of dealerships to diagnose and repair issues can lead to prolonged periods of vehicle downtime, increased repair costs, and frustration for vehicle owners.
symptoms: Dealerships are unable to identify the cause of the problem
multiple visits to dealerships are required to diagnose the issue
dealerships are unable to repair the issue despite multiple attempts.
